thread.title: Brit Awards: Little Mix win 'Best British Single'
thread.title_full: Brit Awards: Little Mix win 'Best British Single' | Tyne Tees - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Brit Awards: Little Mix win 'Best British Single'

organizations.name: sunderland york north yorkshire newcastle county durham gateshead durham northumberland teesside tyne

text:
Little Mix have won 'Best British Single' tonight at the Brit Awards.
Little Mix Credit: PA Jade Thirlwall and Perrie Edwards, both from South Tyneside, Jesy Nelson and Leigh-Anne Pinnock make up the four-piece act.
They picked up an award for their hit single 'Shout out to my Ex'.
Last updated Wed 22 Feb 2017 Read more 3 updates Brit Awards: North East winners Sunderland York North Yorkshire Newcastle County Durham Gateshead Durham Northumberland Teesside Tyne and Wear Middlesbrough
